script.name: !job.dukes.boarding
script.description: Improved Boarding: NPC - Run scrips, pick targets and board
script.sourceplaintext:
* Improve Boarding - NPC Boarding Control * ============================= * Author: Cycrow * Created: 29/11/2009 * Modified: 04-11-2020 * ============================= * Controls the NPC Boarding parties * - Idles for given time (from settings) * - Resupply, boarding pods, marines * - waits for escorts if not availble * - Finds sutible Target (priorities player) * - Orders wingman to take down shields * - Attempts to Board * ============================= *$DEBUG = [TRUE] $DEBUG = [FALSE] set global variable: name='boarding.debug' value=$DEBUG
[THIS] ->set autojump active: [TRUE] [THIS] ->set emergency jump active: [TRUE] [THIS] ->autojump emergency jump shield threshold= 25% [THIS] ->autojump minimum jumps= 1
do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: Starting boarding job, sector=%s', [THIS], [SECTOR], null, null, null
* first, find a home base to use (closest race dock) $flags = [Find.Nearest] $homebase = [THIS] -> get homebase skip if $homebase -> exists $homebase = find station in galaxy: startsector=[SECTOR] class or type=Dock race=[OWNER] flags=$flags refobj=[THIS] serial=null max.jumps=100
do if $homebase -> exists [THIS] ->set homebase to $homebase
gosub sub.ReturnHome
[THIS] ->set local variable: name='boarding.npc' value=[TRUE] $wing = [THIS] -> get local variable: name='boarding.wing' if not $wing $name = [THIS] -> get name $wing = create a new flight wing: name='Boarding Wing', race=[OWNER], colour=null [THIS] ->set local variable: name='boarding.wing' value=$wing end
$next.board.time = playing time
* Starting main loop while [THIS] -> exists if is a new script version available $script = get script name @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.restart.task : Object=[THIS] Script=$script Task=0 Argument 1=null Argument 2=null Argument 3=null Argument 4=null Argument 5=null return null end
@ = wait randomly from 1000 to 3000 ms
do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: STAGE 1: Moving home', [THIS], $escortCount, null, null, null
gosub sub.CheckRequirements if not $ret.ready gosub sub.ReturnHome end
* Stage 2: Resupply do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: STAGE 2: Resupplying', [THIS], $escortCount, null, null, null gosub sub.Resupply
* Stage 3: idle do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: STAGE 3: Idling', [THIS], $escortCount, null, null, null gosub sub.Idle
do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: STAGE 4: Checking Requirements', [THIS], $escortCount, null, null, null
gosub sub.CheckRequirements if not $ret.ready continue end
do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: STAGE 4: Checking Escorts', [THIS], $escortCount, null, null, null
* Stage 4: Check we are ready for op gosub sub.GetEscortCount do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: Current Escorts = %s', [THIS], $escortCount, null, null, null
if $escortCount < 2 do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: Not enough escorts', [THIS], $escortCount, null, null, null continue end
do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: Ready for target', [THIS], $escortCount, null, null, null
$current.time = playing time if $next.board.time > $current.time do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: still waitin for next boarding time', [THIS], $escortCount, null, null, null continue end
gosub sub.GetEscortCount gosub sub.FindTarget *$target = [PLAYERSHIP] do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: Found target to board: %s', [THIS], $target, null, null, null gosub sub.HuntTarget
gosub sub.ReturnHome @ = wait randomly from 60000 to 120000 ms [THIS] ->reset flight time end return null
* =================================== * SUB: Returns the number of escort ships (fighters + captials) - Includes Dock * =================================== sub.GetEscortCount: $aFollowers = [THIS] -> get formation follower ships $is.covered = [THIS] ->is race covered $table.followers = table alloc
$count = size of array $aFollowers while $count dec $count = $ship = $aFollowers[$count] if $ship -> is of class Fighter $follower = $ship gosub sub.AdjustFollower gosub sub.RefuelFollower inc $escortCount =
else if $ship -> is of class Big Ship $follower = $ship gosub sub.AdjustFollower gosub sub.RefuelFollower
skip if $ship -> is of class TM $table.followers[$ship] = [THIS] $aDocked = $ship -> get ship array from sector/ship/station if $aDocked do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: Docked followers (%s) = %s', [THIS], $ship, $aDocked, null, null
$d.count = size of array $aDocked while $d.count dec $d.count = $d.ship = $aDocked[$d.count] if $d.ship -> is of class Fighter $follower = $d.ship gosub sub.AdjustFollower $table.followers[$d.ship] = $ship end end end
$d.followers = $ship -> get formation follower ships do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: Follower, %s, followers = %s', [THIS], $ship, $d.followers, null, null
if $d.followers $d.count = size of array $d.followers while $d.count dec $d.count = $d.ship = $d.followers[$d.count] if $d.ship -> is of class Fighter $follower = $d.ship gosub sub.AdjustFollower gosub sub.RefuelFollower $table.followers[$d.ship] = $ship end end end end end
$escortCount = size of table $table.followers do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: Found followers (%s) = %s', [THIS], $escortCount, $table.followers, null, null endsub
sub.AdjustFollower: skip if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive in cargo bay = [THIS] -> install 1 units of Jumpdrive
$follower ->set autojump active: [TRUE] $follower ->autojump minimum jumps= 1 $follower ->set jumpdrive fuel resupply: amount=30 $follower ->set pirate cover state to $is.covered endsub
sub.RefuelFollower: $energy = $follower -> get amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay $needed = $follower ->get needed jump energy: jumps=50 $needed = $needed - $energy if $needed > 0 $energy = [THIS] -> get amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay $free = $follower -> get free amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay $needed = get minimum, $needed, $energy, $free, null, null $needed = - $needed $moved = [THIS] -> add $needed units of Energy Cells if $moved $moved = - $moved $transfered = $follower -> add $moved units of Energy Cells if $transfered < $moved $needed = $moved - $transfered = [THIS] -> add $needed units of Energy Cells end end end endsub
* =================================== * SUB: Hunt the selected target and board * =================================== sub.HuntTarget: skip if $target -> exists endsub
do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: Hunting target: %s', [THIS], $target, null, null, null
skip if [THIS] -> get true amount of ware Jumpdrive in cargo bay = [THIS] -> install 1 units of Jumpdrive
while not [THIS] -> is in same sector as $target $target.sector = $target -> get sector $target.pos = $target -> get position as array append $target.sector to array $target.pos @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.jumptogate.nearest : targetpos=$target.pos should followers jump too=[TRUE] @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetosector : sector=$target.sector
$aFollowers = [THIS] -> get formation follower ships $count = size of array $aFollowers while $count dec $count = $f = $aFollowers[$count] @ START $f -> call script !move.follow.template : target ship=[THIS] protect the ship=[TRUE] attack same target=[TRUE] attack nearest enemy=[FALSE] stop if leader is docked at same=[FALSE] end @ = wait 100 ms end
do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: Moving to target: %s', [THIS], $target, null, null, null @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetoobject.samesector : Target=$target Range=8000
do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: Starting to board: %s', [THIS], $target, null, null, null @ = [THIS] -> call script !fight.board : Target Ship=$target endsub
* =================================== * SUB: Return home, and resupply from homebase * =================================== sub.ReturnHome: if [HOMEBASE] -> exists $newSector = [HOMEBASE] -> get sector gosub sub.MoveSector @ = [THIS] -> call script !ship.cmd.returnhome.std : gosub sub.ResupplyAtDock end endsub
sub.ResupplyAtDock:
do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: Resuppling at dock: %s', [THIS], [DOCKEDAT], $table.followers, null, null
if [THIS] -> is docked * install needed software skip if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Cargo Lifesupport System in cargo bay = [THIS] -> install 1 units of Cargo Lifesupport System skip if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive in cargo bay = [THIS] -> install 1 units of Jumpdrive skip if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive Installation Kit in cargo bay = [THIS] -> add 1 units of Jumpdrive Installation Kit skip if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Transporter Device in cargo bay = [THIS] -> add 1 units of Transporter Device
do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: Installing equipment', [THIS], [DOCKEDAT], $table.followers, null, null
* resupply if [DOCKEDAT] -> can sell ware Energy Cells $energy = [THIS] -> get amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay
gosub sub.GetNeededEnergy if $energy < $needed = [THIS] -> buy $needed units of Energy Cells end end if [DOCKEDAT] -> can sell ware Boarding Pod $pods = [THIS] -> get amount of ware Boarding Pod in cargo bay
do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: Buying pods from docked: %s', [THIS], $pods, $table.followers, null, null
if $pods < 10 $bought = [THIS] -> buy 20 units of Boarding Pod do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: Bough boarding pds: %s', [THIS], $bought, $table.followers, null, null end end if [THIS] -> free space for marines $marines = [DOCKEDAT] -> get marines array
if $marines if size of array $marines $table.marines = table alloc $i = size of array $marines while $i dec $i = $marine = $marines[$i] $skill = $marine -> get marine fighting skill if $skill >= 40 $table.marines[$marine] = $skill end end if size of table $table.marines $sorted.array = sort table keys by value: table=$table.marines $i = size of array $sorted.array while $i dec $i = $marine = $marines[$i] = [THIS] ->buy marine: $marine
skip if [THIS] -> free space for marines break end end end end end end
endsub
* =================================== * =================================== sub.CheckRequirements: $ret.ready = [TRUE] $pods = [THIS] -> get amount of ware Boarding Pod in cargo bay if $pods < 10 do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: REQUIREMENTS, Not enogh boarding pds: %s', [THIS], $pods, $needed, $extra.energy, null $ret.ready = [FALSE] end if [THIS] -> free space for marines $free.marines = [THIS] -> free space for marines $marines = [THIS] -> get marines array $marines = size of array $marines do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: REQUIREMENTS, not enogh marines: %s (Free: %s)', [THIS], $marines, $free.marines, $extra.energy, null $ret.ready = [FALSE] end
endsub
* =================================== * =================================== sub.GetNeededEnergy: $v = [THIS] ->get needed jump energy: jumps=50 $needed = 600 + $v $extra.energy = ( $needed * 110 ) / 100 endsub
* =================================== * =================================== sub.Resupply: $max.range = 4 skip if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Freight Drone in cargo bay = [THIS] -> add 1 units of Freight Drone
$energy = [THIS] -> get amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay gosub sub.GetNeededEnergy if $energy < $needed do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: Looking to resupply energy, got=%s, needed=%s, extra=%s', [THIS], $energy, $needed, $extra.energy, null
@ = [THIS] -> call script !move.resupply.self : Ware to Resupply=Energy Cells Quantity=$extra.energy Max Fly Range=$max.range do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: Resuppling: %s', [THIS], [DOCKEDAT], $needed, $extra.energy, null gosub sub.ResupplyAtDock end $pods = [THIS] -> get amount of ware Boarding Pod in cargo bay if $pods < 8 $pods = [THIS] -> get amount of ware Boarding Pod in cargo bay do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: looking to get more boardng pods: %s', [THIS], $pods, $needed, $extra.energy, null @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.resupply.self : Ware to Resupply=Boarding Pod Quantity=10 Max Fly Range=$max.range gosub sub.ResupplyAtDock end endsub
* =================================== * =================================== sub.MoveSector: if $newSector -> exists while $newSector != [SECTOR] $next.sector = get next sector on route from sector [SECTOR] to sector $newSector do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: Moving to next sector: %s', [THIS], $next.sector, $endTime, null, null @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetosector : sector=$next.sector $sector.owner = [SECTOR] -> get owner race if $sector.owner != [TRUEOWNER] $cover = [TRUE] else $cover = [FALSE] end [THIS] ->set pirate cover state to $cover gosub sub.GetEscortCount @ = wait 200 ms end end
* =================================== * SUB: idle around for awhile * =================================== sub.Idle:
if [THIS] -> is docked @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.undock : end
@ $idletime = [THIS] -> call script !lib.job.getidletime : do if $idletime < 600 $idletime = 600 $time = playing time $idletime = 60 $endTime = $time + $idletime
do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: Idling time: %s', [THIS], $idletime, $endTime, null, null
while $endTime > $time @ = wait randomly from 1000 to 3000 ms $rand = random value from 0 to 3 - 1
* move to new sector if $rand == 0 $jumps = random value from 1 to 3 - 1 $newSector = find a random sector: startsector=[SECTOR], jumps=$jumps, owner=null gosub sub.MoveSector * otherwise idle about in sector else $waitTime = random value from 120 to 500 - 1 @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.idle.timeout : timeout in sec=$waitTime wait while docked=[TRUE] end $time = playing time end
endsub
* =================================== * SUB: Find a target to board * =================================== sub.FindTarget: $trys = 5 $jumps = 5 $target = null while $trys dec $trys =
* compute the chance of player ship as target $noto = get notoriety from race Player to race [TRUEOWNER] $noto.level = get notoriety level: amount=$noto $noto.level = 10 - $noto.level $noto.level = $noto.level * $noto.level $rnd = random value from 0 to 500 - 1
do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: Finding target, noto=%s, level=%s, rnd=%s', [THIS], $noto, $noto.level, $rnd, null
if $rnd > $noto.level $race = Player else $rnd = random value from 0 to 20 - 1 if $rnd < 2 $race = Argon else if $rnd < 4 $race = Boron else if $rnd < 5 $race = Teladi else if $rnd < 7 $race = Split else if $rnd < 12 $race = Yaki else $race = Paranid end end
do if $DEBUG write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s: Found race to target: %s', [THIS], $race, $noto.level, $rnd, null
$aShips = get ship array: of race $race class/type=Big Ship $count = size of array $aShips while $count dec $count = $ship = $aShips[$count] $sector = $ship -> get sector $ship.jumps = get jumps from sector [SECTOR] to sector $sector if $ship.jumps > $jumps remove element from array $aShips at index $count end end if size of array $aShips $count = size of array $aShips $count = random value from 0 to $count - 1 $target = $aShips[$count] end do if $target -> exists break inc $jumps = end endsub
return null
